game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden within the ruins of Eldarath.
game.description: Legend has it that the lost city of Eldarath holds a powerful artifact, one that could bring prosperity to our kingdom. Your quest is to find this artifact and return it to us.
game.reward: A chest filled with gold coins and a magical amulet granting resistance to darkness

tasks.objective: Gather information about the location of Eldarath's ruins.
tasks.description: Speak with local scholars, traders and travelers to gather as much information as possible.

tasks.objective: Reach the entrance of Eldarath's ruins.
tasks.description: Travel through the dense forest until you reach the ancient structure. Be wary of goblin attacks and wild beasts

tasks.objective: Navigate the ruins to find the artifact chamber.
tasks.description: Avoid deadly traps, puzzles and terrifying creatures as you venture deeper into the ruins.
